Name: Hero's Radiance
Description: After accepting the Class unlock quest in the Class interface, give it to Milia, the Class guide at the Development Bureau, and complete the subsequent challenges to unlock a new Class.
Description$english: After accepting the Class unlock quest in the Class interface, give it to Milia, the Class guide at the Development Bureau, and complete the subsequent challenges to unlock a new Class.
Description2$english: A gem representing courage and resilience, obtainable only by adventurers who have undergone adventures.
